scripts.copy-base: mkdir -p ../diff/base && cd .. && git ls-tree -r --name-only HEAD output/ | grep '\.png$' | while read file; do git show HEAD:"$file" | git lfs smudge > "diff/base/$(basename "$file")"; done
scripts.report-local: npm run eoa && npm run copy-base && npm run copy-compare && npm run diff && npm run report-live
